title: Bug 37021 - Source path incorrect in declare warning on binary files
description: Bug 37021 - Source path incorrect in declare warning on binary files. The issue is observed when targeting .class files from injars. The source path is listed in the form 'app.Main.class' instead of 'app/Main'. Sometimes, the filenames may not appear at all. To reproduce this issue, follow the provided code in the 'tests/new/binaryWarnings' directory.
OB: In declare warning messages when targeting .class files from injars, the source path is listed in the form 'app.Main.class' instead of 'app/Main'. The filenames may not appear at all, but this problem is not reproduced by the provided tests.
EB: The source path in declare warning messages when targeting .class files from injars should be listed in the form 'app/Main.class' instead of 'app.Main.class'.
SR:
To reproduce this issue:
1. Run the code provided in the 'tests/new/binaryWarnings' directory.
2. Observe the declare warning messages when targeting .class files from injars.
3. Note that the source path is listed in the form 'app.Main.class' instead of 'app/Main'.
